text: Belisario Betancur Cuartas (4 February 1923 - 7 December 2018) was an Colombian politician. He was the 26th President of Colombia from 1982 to 1986.Arismendi Posada, Ignacio; Gobernantes Colombianos; trans. Colombian Presidents; Interprint Editors Ltd., Italgraf, Segunda Edición; Page 255; Bogotá, Colombia; 1983 Betancur was born on 4 February 1923 in Amagá, Antioquia, Colombia. He studied at Pontifical Bolivarian University. Betancur died on 7 December 2018 in Bogotá from a kidney infection at the age of 95.Falleció el expresidente colombiano Belisario Betancur Cuartas ==References== ==Other websites== *Biography by CIDOB Foundation * Betancur's page at the Pontifical Academy of Social Sciences Category:1923 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from kidney disease Category:Ambassadors of Colombia Category:Presidents of Colombia
title: Belisario Betancur
